version_description:
What’s New?

Latest Update V.1.1.0

- New Adventure Map: More Exciting and Gain more marbles! by beating the boss! If the boss is defeated, you win the game!
- Lucky Mileage System: Get a point by drawing a pendant! Collect and get S Pendan

What’s New?

Latest Update V.1.2.0

- Battlefield Map: NEW EXCITING map you will be addicted to!
- Treasure Hunter Mode: New Exciting Mode that will make you RICH everyday
- All New Interface & UI Improvement
- New Features: Buff

What’s New?

Latest Update V.1.3.0

- Zombie Map: Let's Co-op and fight Zombie King Together to Win Together! But beware yourself to be a Zombie!
- Champion League: Mode for Real Winners! See how far you can win and Claim your Consecutive W

What’s New?

Latest Update V.1.4.0

- God's Hand Map: Get God's Power to Lift up any land to block your enemy! New Exciting Strategy to play and win!
- Release God Characters and God's Items: May God's Power be with you!
- Team Skill -

What’s New?

Latest Update V.1.5.0

- Magic Land Map: Let's be fun with Puppet Magic to move your friends to wherever you want!
- New Condition for Each Mode Entrance: Let's be more fun and fair! Fully Enjoy the game even you are a newbie!

1.5.2 Version Update:

> Limited Time Shop Open
> Bug Fixed

This game is fun for all ages – just roll the dice and you’re off on an adventure!
Journey around the world with your friends or family members.
Roll the dice and feel the fun!
This game packs all the thrill of being a real estate tycoon– just d
